name: 7 Dice Wonders
description:
A Print And Play dice game based on "7 Wonders" by Antoine Bauza from Repos Production. The artwork (for the icons) is based on the original artwork by Miguel Coimbra.

This game was created for the "In-A-Tin" / "Express" Print-and-Play Design Contest - Discussion Thread and shall forever be a free print and play game, by a fan for other fans of the original.

It won the contest (1st Place ("Overall Game"))

Addt'l. categories:
1st Place "Best In-A-Tin Game"
1st Place "Best Express Game"
1st Place "Best Express Game that fits In-A-Tin"
1st Place "Best Solitaire Game"
2nd Place "Game with the Best Cover/Label Art"

Gameplay:
Players roll six of the seven dice per round (age). They will reroll first four then two dice. And finally spend the results of the roll on several avenues on the scorecard: War, Victory Points, Wonder Building, everything is possible.

After three rounds (ages) the totals are made and the military strengths are compared - to adjust the final results.

The player with the highest total in victory points is the winner.

Components:
7 Dice. 7 Cards. 1 Scorepad
